name: Touhou - Artisans of Bullet Hell
description:
A Bullet Hell Artistry #6 contest entry, made by zino lath, hosted by Bullet Hell Engines Discord Server.

Hit me up for feedback/questions on @DrawyZino on Twitter, or zino#2680 on Discord!!

Don't forget to turn on Render Skip and Low Performance mode if you're having FPS issues!

Special thanks to: 

zane_jgr,  kobito, Kevin Monitor for danmaku help

Naudiz, Kevin Monitor, Neck Logo and Horrible for playtesting/benchmarking

SpooderBoi for the title theme

Ryann for whatever uaup is so i could use housui

Taizen Chisou, Almagest, Ryann1908 and Junky for judging this script

And You For Downloading And Playing it!!!!!
